messages.subject: RESERVATION DEADLINE EXTENDED! -  for Unschooler's Winter Waterpark Gathering
messages.msgSnippet: Great news! The final deadline for making reservations for the Unschoolers Winter Waterpark Gathering has been extended to Jan. 7, 2008. So, those of you who
messages.messageBody:
Great news!

The final deadline for making reservations for the Unschoolers Winter Waterpark Gathering has been extended to Jan. 7, 2008.

So, those of you who received some extra holiday cash, you still have time to make your reservation!

Join us for a week of awesome fun and support with 150+ other unschooly / life learning homeschooling families from around the country, at Ohio's Kalahari Resort - the largest Indoor Waterpark in the USA.

For further details and information on how to register, please join our UWWG yahoo group at: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UWWG/

Happy Holidays and hope to see you in January!

Carol Reinhard
UWWG Coordinator


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
